property.name: clustering.file.prefix
property.description: prefix for the final output of each clustering file

property.name: mapred.child.java.opts
property.description: Memory assigned to each task node JVM

property.name: mapred.reduce.tasks
property.description: The number of reducers used for the job

property.name: mapred.map.output.compression.codec
property.description: Compress codec for mapper's output, using BZip since it supports splitting

property.name: mapred.output.compression.type
property.description: Compress type for mapper's output, change from RECORD to BLOCK to make it more efficient

property.name: mapred.tasks.speculative.execution
property.description: Turn off the speculative execution to avoid running the same reduce tasks multiple times

property.name: mapred.task.timeout
property.description: The number of milliseconds before a task will be terminated if it neither reads an input, writes an output, nor updates its status string

property.name: io.sort.mb
property.description: Each mapper task has a circular memory that it writes the output to

property.name: io.sort.factor
property.description: This property controls the maximum number of streams to merge at once, the default is 10

property.name: mapred.task.profile
property.description: Whether to enable the JVM build-in profiler

property.name: mapred.task.profile.maps
property.description: the mapper tasks to be profiled

property.name: mapred.task.profile.reduces
property.description: the reducer tasks to be profiled
